name: preternaturally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not usual or natural: The house seemed preternaturally silent. She has an almost preternaturally calm manner. See
preternatural
More examplesFewer examplesHe is preternaturally gifted at cooking.My 4-year-old niece seems preternaturally mature. The artist has created a work that is preternaturally beautiful.
